## Vault.create() method

Create a new plaintext file inside the vault.

**Signature:**

```typescript
create(path: string, data: string, options?: DataWriteOptions): Promise<TFile>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>path</code> | <code>string</code> | Vault absolute path for the new file, with extension. |
|  <code>data</code> | <code>string</code> | text content for the new file. |
|  <code>options</code> | [`DataWriteOptions`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataWriteOptions.md) | _(Optional)_ (Optional) |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<`[`TFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TFile.md)`>`
